Thu Dec 28 03:12:00 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/include
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/include/ldap.h /opt/include//ldap.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/include/ldif.h /opt/include//ldif.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/include/lber.h /opt/include//lber.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/include/ldap_utf8.h /opt/include//ldap_utf8.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/include/ldap_schema.h /opt/include//ldap_schema.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/include/openldap.h /opt/include//openldap.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/include/slapi-plugin.h /opt/include//slapi-plugin.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/include/lber_types.h /opt/include//lber_types.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/include/ldap_features.h /opt/include//ldap_features.h
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/include/ldap_cdefs.h /opt/include//ldap_cdefs.h
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib//pkgconfig
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/lib/liblber.la /opt/lib//liblber.la
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/lib/liblber.so.2 /opt/lib//liblber.so.2
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/lib/libldap.so.2.0.200 /opt/lib//libldap.so.2.0.200
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/lib/liblber.so /opt/lib//liblber.so
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/lib/libldap.so.2 /opt/lib//libldap.so.2
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/lib/libldap.la /opt/lib//libldap.la
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/openldap-2.6.6/lib/libldap.so /opt/lib//libldap.so
